name: Fat Fish Aquarium
description:
Do you like Fat Fish? 

Do you like Aquariums?

Well you'll love this game!

------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

F - Fullscreen

Left Click - Literally everything else

------------------------------------------------------------------

Update & Fixes Log:

- Fixed Fattest Fish not going away upon clearing data

- Fixed Thin Fish A.I.

- Fixed Fattest Fish stuttering when turning

- Made Installer EXE for itch.io

- Added Robo-Fish

- Added Upgrades area in shop

- Merged bonus shop with regular shop

- Money fish eats more different types of money now

- Made food hitbox bigger

- Fixed various other bugs

- Changed Robo-Fish drop rate & price

- Fixed issues with food dropping from the Robo-Fish

------------------------------------------------------------------

Newgrounds Release:

Feel free to check it out on Newgrounds!

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/876358?updated=1678067064
